DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy tooth interproximal cleaning modality without chemistry oral health 28 day .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Interproximal Cleaning Modalities Oral Health
DOC.criteria: Be willing physically able carry study procedure available time require participation Be able fully understand comply write verbal instruction provide Provide write Informed Consent Be age 18 65 year Agree return study material require visit Be nonsmoker Have minimum 20 'scorable ' teeth ( exclude 3rd molar ) Have minimum average plaque score > 0.5 per RMNPI score 26 hour plaque accumulation Have Gingival Bleeding Index > 1 least 10 site Be regular manual toothbrush user Be non irregular flosser define use dental floss interproximal cleaning technique per week less often A medical dental condition would unduly affected participation study , per Investigator discretion Pregnant nursing per subject report A medical condition require antibiotic premedication prior dental appointment Diagnosis xerostomia Any oral extra oral piercing interferes ability perform study procedure and/or clinical assessment mouth Currently undergo require dental/periodontal treatment , periodontal treatment six month precede study , subject 's study participation could present undue safety risk obscure evaluation study endpoint , per Investigator /Examiner discretion Oral surgery within last 2 month Current use professionally dispense bleaching product A know allergy sensitivity product plan use study Unwillingness abstain oral hygiene product prescribe duration study Unwillingness abstain oral hygiene product prescribe duration study Participation oral care study within previous 90 day Be employee relative employee Site clinical research department , dental school , dental product manufacturing , research marketing firm Are dental student dental professional A cardiac pacemaker implant cardiac defibrillator InsulinDependent Diabetes Current use antibiotic medication use within 4 week enrollment Current use prescriptiondose antiinflammatory medication anticoagulant ; ( include aspirin > 81 mg daily ) Presence advance periodontal disease excessive gingival recession , per Investigator/Examiner discretion Heavy deposit calculus , either supragingival and/or subgingival , per Investigator/Examiner discretion Extensive crown bridge work and/or rampant decay , per Investigator/Examiner discretion Presence orthodontic band interfere efficacy outcome ( ) per Investigator/Examiner discretion Have professional prophylaxis within 4 week study Be regular power toothbrush user
